e-editiones
About Semantic Web Technology Ontologies

Text Structure

Formal description of text structure, subclasses, related classes, and properties.
Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure
a
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Roberta Padlina, project coordinator and software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
and
Reto Baumgartner, tool coordinator and software developer, University of Z端rich, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of text structure, subclasses, related classes, and properties.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
skos:note
Text and text editing are described in other ontologies
and
Prosodic structure and note structure are described in other ontologies
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Z端rich, Switzerland
rdfs:seeAlso
https://files.ifi.uzh.ch/ cl/ siclemat/ lehre/ hs09/ ecl1/ script/ html/ script.html
dct:title
An ontology about text structure
text column
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structured as a column.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
text column
,
colonne de texte
,
colonna di testo
and
Textspalte
rdfs:subClassOf
text readability structure
column text line
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text line of a text column.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
column text line
,
riga di testo di colonna
,
ligne de texte de colonne
and
Text zeile einer Spalte
skos:note
Maximum length of a column line equals the column width.
rdfs:subClassOf
text line
compositional content text structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Content text structure depending on text composition, e.g. a paragraph, section.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
content text structure
and
compositional text structure
compositional text structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structure depending on text composition in a two-dimensional plane, e.g. a line, paragraph, section, page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
text structure
content text structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structure depending on text content, e.g. a paragraph, section, prose, citation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
text structure
dialogue
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text with dialogue structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
compositional content text structure
diary structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text with diary structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
diary structure
,
Tagebuch-Struktur
,
structure de journal
and
struttura del diario
rdfs:subClassOf
compositional content text structure
text structure identifier
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Identifier of a text structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#ContentStructureIdentifier
text line
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structured as a line, filling a two-dimensional space, with an orientation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
text line
,
Textzeile
,
riga di testo
and
ligne de texte
rdfs:subClassOf
text readability structure
text line space
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Empty space between orthographic words in a text line.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
text line space
,
espace de ligne de texte
,
Leerzeichen einer Textzeile
and
spazio della riga di testo
rdfs:subClassOf
text readability structure
orthographic word
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Smallest independent orthographic entity composed of symbols, surrounded by whitespace in a written text line.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
orthographic word
,
mot orthographique
,
parola ortografica
and
orthographisches Wort
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ linguistics#Concept
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#WrittenText
orthographo-syntactic word
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Word being orthographic and syntactic.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
skos:note
Common word.
rdfs:subClassOf
orthographic word
and
syntactic word
text page
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structured as a page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
text readability structure
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#Page
page text line
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text line of a text page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
skos:note
In case of a horizontal line, its maximum length equals the page width minus margins.
rdfs:subClassOf
text line
paragraph
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Composition of sentences ending with a line break.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
compositional content text structure
and
sentence structure
postcard structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text with postcard structure.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
compositional content text structure
prose
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Syntactic structure with a sentence as unit, in a natural flow of speech.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
sentence structure
punctuation
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
One or more language symbols in written text, different from a letter, to help interpret semantics of a sentence.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
punctuation
,
punteggiatura
,
Interpunktion
and
ponctuation
rdfs:subClassOf
text readability structure
,
syntactic text structure
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ linguistics#Symbol
text readability structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Compositional text structure providing text readability, e.g. a line, column, page.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#SurfaceText
and
compositional text structure
rhyme
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Words or phrases with whole or end corresponding sound, especially when involving the last stressed vowel and all succeeding sounds.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
content text structure
scientific text structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Content text structure depending on scientific purpose, e.g. a critical apparatus.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
content text structure
text section
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Composition of paragraphs, mostly about a certain topic.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
text section
,
Textabschnitt
,
sezione di testo
and
section de texte
rdfs:subClassOf
sentence structure
and
compositional content text structure
text section identifier
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Identifier of a text section.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
text structure identifier
text section ordinal number
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Ordinal number of a text section.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
text section identifier
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ mathematics#OrdinalNumber
sentence
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Syntactic structure comprising one or more linked syntactic words, basically a subject and predicate.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
sentence
,
frase
,
Satz
and
phrase
rdfs:subClassOf
content text structure
and
syntactic text structure
sentence structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Content structure depending on sentences, e.g. a paragraph, section, prose
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
content text structure
text structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text as structure abstracted from its carrier, e.g. a word, sentence, text line, paragraph, section, verse, strophe, citation.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
skos:note
Making up a text expression, without necessarily being one itself.
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text#Text
and
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#ContentStructure
surface sentence
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Sentence expressed on a surface.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
surface sentence
,
frase di superficie
,
Fl辰chesatz
and
phrase de surface
skos:note
A surface sentence can be considered as a syntactic directed text line or text vector.
rdfs:subClassOf
sentence
and
text line
syntactic text structure
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Text structure depending on natural language-specific syntax, e.g. a word, sentence.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
text structure
syntactic word
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Smallest independent syntactic structure composed of symbols that can be replaced in a sentence or verse.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ linguistics#Concept
and
syntactic text structure
text table
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Two-dimensional structure composed of one or more fields containing text, and being part of a vertical column and a horizontal row, both with own identifier.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:subClassOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#Table
and
compositional content text structure
text structure has identifier
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a text structure to its identifier.
rdfs:domain
text structure
rdfs:isDefinedBy
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ text-structure#
rdfs:label
text structure has identifier
,
la structure du texte a un identifiant
,
la struttura del testo ha un identificatore
and
Textstruktur hat Identifikator
rdfs:range
text structure identifier
rdfs:subPropertyOf
http://www.e-editiones.ch/ ontology/ document#contentStructureHasIdentifier
